name: Monthly Progress Report
query:
SELECT
    dept_name AS Department,
    COUNT(*) AS Total_Raised_Tickets,
    COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'closed' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS Total_Closed_Tickets,
    COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN status IN ('Open','Read', 'In-Progress', 'On-Hold', 'Re-Opened', 'Resolved') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS Total_Pending_Tickets,
    COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'Cancelled' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS Total_Canceled_Tickets
FROM `tabSahayog Ticket`
WHERE call_log_date >= '2024/01/01'
AND call_log_date <= '2024/01/31'
GROUP BY dept_name;
